meanings.part_of_speech: Noun, Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no', Adverb (fukushi)
Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no'
Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no', Noun, Adverb (fukushi)

kanji_explanation: The first kanji means most or extreme. It gives the idea of the highest degree or the top of something. For example, さいきん uses it to mean the most recent time or these days. Another example is さいしょ which shows the idea of the very first or the beginning.

explanations.explanation: The word もっとも means "most" or "extremely" in a way that indicates something being of the highest degree or rank. It can also serve as a conjunction meaning "however," often used to present a counterpoint or exception to what was previously stated.
explanations.youtube_description:
Learn how to use the Japanese word 最も (もっとも) in everyday conversations!  
In this video, we'll explore its meanings and collocations to help you master this essential vocabulary.
Whether you're a beginner or looking to expand your Japanese skills, this video is perfect for you. Don't forget to like, comment, and subscribe for more language learning content!
explanations.motivation: The word we'll be learning in this section is もっとも which you will often hear in conversations when people want to emphasize the highest degree of something or when they are introducing a contrasting point.
explanations.synonyms_explanation: The most common synonym of the word もっとも is ひじょうに, which also means "extremely" or "very." While both are used to emphasize, ひじょうに is more frequently used in formal writing and speeches, whereas もっとも can also be used in everyday conversations to denote a counterpoint as a conjunction.
explanations.antonyms_explanation: The most common antonyms of the word もっとも is さいしょう, which means "least." While もっとも denotes the highest degree, さいしょう indicates the lowest or smallest degree or quantity.

examples.kanji: この花は最も美しいです。
examples.furigana: このはなは最(も)も美(うつく)しいです。

translation.Japanese: この花は最も美しいです。
translation.English: This flower is the most beautiful.
translation.Indonesian: Bunga ini adalah yang paling indah.
translation.Filipino: Ang bulaklak na ito ang pinakamaganda.
translation.Vietnamese: Bông hoa này là đẹp nhất.
translation.Burmese: ဒီပန်းက အလှဆုံးပါ။
translation.French: Cette fleur est la plus belle.
translation.Spanish: Esta flor es la más hermosa.

examples.furigana: 勉強(べんきょう)が最も重要(もっ(ともじゅうよう)です。

translation.Vietnamese: Học tập là quan trọng nhất.

examples.kanji: 富士山は日本で最も高い山です。
examples.furigana: 富士山(ふじさん)は日本(にほん)で最(もっと)も高(たか)い山(やま)です。

translation.Japanese: 富士山は日本で最も高い山です。
translation.English: Mount Fuji is the highest mountain in Japan.
translation.Persian: کوه فوجی بلندترین کوه در ژاپن است.
translation.Nepali: फुजी पहाड जापानको सबैभन्दा अग्लो पहाड हो।
translation.Indonesian: Gunung Fuji adalah gunung tertinggi di Jepang.
translation.Filipino: Ang Mount Fuji ay ang pinakamataas na bundok sa Japan.
translation.Vietnamese: Núi Phú Sĩ là ngọn núi cao nhất ở Nhật Bản.
translation.Burmese: ဖူဂျိတောင်သည် ဂျပန်တွင် အမြင့်မားသည့် တောင်ဖြစ်သည်။
translation.Hindi: फुजी पर्वत जापान का सबसे ऊँचा पर्वत है।
translation.Arabic: جبل فوجي هو الجبل الأعلى في اليابان.
translation.French: Le mont Fuji est la montagne la plus haute du Japon.
translation.Spanish: El Monte Fuji es la montaña más alta de Japón.
translation.Chinese: 富士山是日本最高的山。
translation.Bengali: ফুজি পর্বত জাপানের সবচেয়ে উঁচু পর্বত।

examples.furigana: それが最も(もとも)です。

translation.Vietnamese: Đó là lựa chọn đúng nhất.
translation.French: C'est la chose la plus correcte.
translation.Spanish: Esa es la opción más correcta.

examples.furigana: 猫(ねこ)が最(もっと)も好き(すき)です。

translation.Persian: من گربه‌ها را بیشتر از همه دوست دارم.
translation.Nepali: म बिरालोलाई सबैभन्दा धेरै मन पराउँछु।
translation.Hindi: मुझे बिल्लियाँ सबसे ज़्यादा पसंद हैं।
translation.Bengali: আমি বিড়ালকে সবচেয়ে বেশি পছন্দ করি।

meanings.part_of_speech: Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no', Noun
